content.text: Match ends, Fiorentina 2, Barcelona 1.
Second Half ends, Fiorentina 2, Barcelona 1.
Attempt saved. Sandro Ramírez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Attempt missed. Matías Vecino (Fiorentina) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Ante Rebic.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Ricardo Bagadur.
Borja Valero (Fiorentina) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sergi Roberto (Barcelona).
Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ante Rebic (Fiorentina).
Attempt missed. Gerard Gumbau (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Pedro with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Federico Bernardeschi.
Attempt blocked. Gerard Gumbau (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergio Busquets.
Substitution, Barcelona. Gerard Gumbau replaces Rafinha.
Substitution, Barcelona. Jordi Masip replaces Marc-André ter Stegen.
Offside, Barcelona. Gerard Piqué tries a through ball, but Marc Bartra is caught offside.
